page.title: 14OTHER LOCAL FARMS
page.content: { LOWER FARM (NOKE)} The farmer owns this farm plus Valley and Rectory farms.(510) acres. He rents Temple View Farm (72) acres. The crops are wheat, barley and grass. The grass is used for grazing by 500 sheep belonging to a neighbour and for making hay which is sold to racing stables.The farm is fully mechanised with storage barns. There is a balancing reservoir with a receiving ditch worked by a pump. { { LOWER WOODS FARM} The farmer owns 155 acres and rents 45 acres from Broadhurst Estates. The crops are wheat, barley and agricultural peas. The grassland is used for grazing by sheep,for hay and for silage. The farm is fully mechanised with storage barns. There are 5 acres of paddocks & buildings.
